pageContext.claim: “Numerous people are in jail and going to jail today. People are already there, but we're looking at long-term sentences under the act. We have a very specific monuments act. And we are looking at long-term jail sentences for these vandals and these hoodlums and these anarchists and agitators, and call them whatever you want.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump repeatedly said people arrested for vandalism during protests over the police killing of George Floyd would face 10-year sentences, but neither state nor federal authorities sought such punishment.
